stylingField.name: overlay
stylingField.description: Should there be an overlay applied, such as foil?

borderColor.mask: { (if is_puma() then "puma_" else "") + (if is_legend() then "crown_border" else "border_mask") + (if card.border_color == rgb(200,200,200) then "_silver" else "") + ".png" }

cardColor.image: { if is_clear() or clear_tops() then "" else if is_fnm() then fnm_background() else if is_inverted() then inverted_background() else if is_full_art() then promo_background() else if pure_snow() then snow_background() else card_background() }

name.left: { if center_map() then 55 else if is_map() then (if use_node() then 65 else 60) else if use_node() then 58 else if card.card_symbol=="none" then 32 else 50 }
name.top: { if is_map() then 27 else if is_devoid() then 30 else if is_clear() or clear_tops() then 31 else 30 }
name.right: { if center_map() then 320 else (if is_map() then 320 else 341) - card_style.casting_cost.content_width }
name.alignment: {if center_map() then "center bottom shrink-overflow" else "left bottom shrink-overflow" }

font.name: { if is_map() then "Beleren Small Caps" else "Beleren Bold" }
font.color: {if is_shifted() or is_fnm() or is_inverted() then "white" else "black"}
font.shadowColor: {if is_shifted() or is_fnm() then rgb(0,0,0) else rgba(0,0,0,0)}

alias.left: {if is_skinned() then 45 else if is_map() then 15 else 33}
alias.width: {if is_skinned() then 285 else if use_evobar() then max(100, card_style.alias.content_width) else 0}

image.left: { if is_clear() or is_map() or is_expanded_art() or is_puma() then 0 else if is_full_art() then 23 else if clear_tops() then 15 else if is_mutate() then 22 else 29}
image.top: {if is_map() then 57 else if is_clear() or is_expanded_art() or clear_tops() then 0 else 59}
image.width: {if is_clear() or is_map() or is_expanded_art() or is_puma() then 375 else if is_full_art() then 328 else if clear_tops() then 345 else if is_mutate() then 330 else 316}
image.height: {if is_clear() or is_expanded_art() then 523 else if is_map() then 241 else if is_puma() then (if is_mutate() then 334 else 265) else if is_full_art() then 423 else if clear_tops() then 291 else if is_mutate() then 334 else 231}
image.mask: { if is_devoid() then "image_mask_devoid.png" else if is_clear() then "image_mask.png" else if is_thbland() then "cornermask.png" else if is_puma() then "puma_mask" + (if is_mutate() then "_mutate.png" else "3.png") else if is_expanded_art() then expanded_mask() else if is_full_art() then "promo/image_mask" + (if is_rare() and styling.use_holofoil_stamps then "_rare") + ".png" else if is_mutate() and not clear_tops() then "mutate_mask.png" else ""}

indicator.left: { (if is_map() then 18  else if is_season() then 43 else 31) + (if is_clear() then 2 else 0) + (if use_flash_dot() then 3 else 0)}
indicator.top: { if is_clear() or is_map() then 298 else if is_thbland() then 449 else if is_full_art() then 332 else 300 }

type.left: { if is_map() then 85 else (if use_flash_dot() then 3 else 0) + if is_season() then (if styling.color_indicator_dot then 64 else 44)+(if is_clear() then 4 else 0) else (if styling.color_indicator_dot then 52 else 32) + (if is_clear() then 4 else 0) }
type.top: { (if is_map() then 297.5 else if is_clear() then 294 else if is_thbland() then 444 else if is_full_art() then 329 else 296) + shrink_type() }
type.width: { if is_map() then 205 else (if styling.color_indicator_dot then "290" else "310") - (if card_style.rarity.width == 0 then 0 else max(22,card_style.rarity.content_width)) - (if is_season() then 12 else 0) }
type.alignment: { if is_map() then "center top shrink-overflow" else "top shrink-overflow"}

font.name: Beleren Bold
font.color: { if is_full_art() or is_puma() or is_shifted() or is_fnm() or is_inverted() then "white" else "black"}
font.shadowColor: {if is_full_art() or is_puma() or is_shifted() or is_fnm() then "black" else rgba(0,0,0,0)}

rarity.right: { if is_map() then 199 else if is_scrolls() then 334 else 344}
rarity.top: { if is_map() then 53 else if is_clear() then 295 else if is_thbland() then 445 else if is_full_art() then 329 else 297 }

text.left: { if (card.level_0 != "" or card.level_1 != "" or card.level_2 != "") then 75 else if is_map() then 40 else 29}
text.width: { if is_leveler() then 0 else (if(card.level_0 != "" or card.level_1 != "" or card.level_2 != "") then -46 else 0) + if is_map() then 287 else 314 }

font.name: MPlantin
font.size: {if styling.font_cap != "" then to_number(styling.font_cap) else (if is_mutate() then 12 else 14)}
font.color: { if is_full_art() or is_fnm() or is_inverted() then "white" else "black"}
font.shadowColor: {if is_full_art() or is_fnm() then "black" else rgba(0,0,0,0)}

symbolFont.name: { styling.text_box_mana_symbols }
symbolFont.size: {if styling.font_cap != "" then to_number(styling.font_cap) else (if is_mutate() then 12 else 14)}

level1Text.left: { if is_leveler() and card.level_0 != "" then (if loy_leveler() then 57 else if box_leveler() then 78 else 75) else if is_map() then 40 else 29}
level1Text.right: { if is_leveler() then (if lone_pt() or card.pt == "" then 342 else 277) else if is_mutate() then 342 else if is_map() then 40 else 29}
level1Text.bottom: { if is_mutate() then 392 else if is_leveler() then (327+lv_1_height()) else bottom_of_textbox() }

font.name: MPlantin
font.color: { if is_full_art() or is_fnm() or is_inverted() then "white" else "black"}
font.shadowColor: {if is_full_art() or is_fnm() then "black" else rgba(0,0,0,0)}

level2Text.left: { if is_leveler() then (if card.level_1 != "" then (if loy_leveler() then 57 else if box_leveler() then 78 else 75) else if is_map() then 40 else 29) else 0}
level2Text.right: { if is_leveler() then (if card.pt_2 != "" then 277 else 342) else 0 }
level2Text.bottom: { if is_leveler() then (329 + lv_2_coordinate()) + lv_2_height()-2 else 0 }

font.name: MPlantin
font.color: { if is_full_art() or is_fnm() or is_inverted() then "white" else "black"}
font.shadowColor: {if is_full_art() or is_fnm() then "black" else rgba(0,0,0,0)}

level3Text.left: {if card.level_2 != "" then (if loy_leveler() then 57 else if box_leveler() then 78 else 75) else if is_map() then 40 else 29}

font.name: MPlantin
font.color: { if is_full_art() or is_fnm() or is_inverted() then "white" else "black"}
font.shadowColor: {if is_full_art() or is_fnm() then "black" else rgba(0,0,0,0)}

level4Text.left: {if card.level_3 != "" then (if loy_leveler() then 57 else if box_leveler() then 78 else 75) else if is_map() then 40 else 29}

font.name: MPlantin
font.color: { if is_full_art() or is_fnm() then "white" else "black"}
font.shadowColor: {if is_full_art() or is_fnm() then "black" else rgba(0,0,0,0)}

watermark.width: { if is_tarot() then 0 else if is_map() then 287 else 334 }
watermark.height: { if is_map() then 154 else if is_full_art() then 120 else 152 }

level0.left: {if box_leveler() then 8 else if loy_leveler() then 14 else 21}
level0.top: {l1_center() - (if aug_leveler(0) then 4 else 2) - (if center_label(0) then 6 else 0) + arrow_offset(0)}
level0.width: {if is_leveler() or card.level_0 != "" then (34 + (if box_leveler() then 30 else 0)) else 0}

font.name: Beleren Bold
font.size: {if loy_leveler() then 11 else 12 + if center_label(0) then 2 else 0}

level1.left: {if box_leveler() then 8 else if loy_leveler() then 14 else 21}
level1.top: {l2_center() - (if aug_leveler(1) then 4 else 2) - (if center_label(1) then 6 else 0) + arrow_offset(1)}
level1.width: {if is_leveler() or card.level_1 != "" then (34 + (if box_leveler() then 30 else 0)) else 0}

font.name: Beleren Bold
font.size: {if loy_leveler() then 11 else 12 + if center_label(0) then 2 else 0}

level2.left: {if box_leveler() then 8 else if loy_leveler() then 14 else 21}
level2.top: {l3_center() - (if aug_leveler(2) then 4 else 2) - (if center_label(2) then 6 else 0) + arrow_offset(2)}
level2.width: {if is_leveler() or card.level_2 != "" then (34 + (if box_leveler() then 30 else 0)) else 0}

font.name: Beleren Bold
font.size: {if loy_leveler() then 11 else 12 + if center_label(0) then 2 else 0}

level3.left: {if box_leveler() then 8 else if loy_leveler() then 14 else 21}
level3.top: {l4_center() - (if aug_leveler(3) then 4 else 2) - (if center_label(3) then 6 else 0) + arrow_offset(3)}
level3.width: {if is_leveler() or card.level_2 != "" then (34 + (if box_leveler() then 30 else 0)) else 0}
level3.height: { if card_style.level_4_text.height < 10 and card.level_3 == "" then 0 else 22}

font.name: Beleren Bold
font.size: {if loy_leveler() then 11 else 12 + if center_label(0) then 2 else 0}

pt.left: {if is_leveler() and not lone_pt() then 291 else 286}
pt.top: { if is_leveler() and not lone_pt() then (l1_center() - 14) else if is_map() then 467 else 469}
pt.width: {if starting_loyalty() and not is_leveler() then 0 else 60}

font.name: Beleren Bold
font.color: {if is_shifted() or is_fnm() or is_inverted() then "white" else if is_vehicle() and (not is_legend() or chosen(styling.other_options, choice:"brown legendary vehicle pt")) then "white" else "black"}
font.shadowColor: {if is_shifted() or is_fnm() then rgb(0,0,0) else rgba(0,0,0,0)}

pt2.width: {if is_leveler() and not lone_pt() or card.pt_2 != "" then 60 else 0}

font.name: Beleren Bold
font.color: {if is_shifted() or is_fnm() or is_inverted() then "white" else if is_vehicle() and (not is_legend() or chosen(styling.other_options, choice:"brown legendary vehicle pt")) then "white" else "black"}
font.shadowColor: {if is_shifted() or is_fnm() then rgb(0,0,0) else rgba(0,0,0,0)}

pt3.width: {if is_leveler() and not lone_pt() or card.pt_3 != "" then 60 else 0}

font.name: Beleren Bold
font.color: {if is_shifted() or is_fnm() or is_inverted() then "white" else if is_vehicle() and (not is_legend() or chosen(styling.other_options, choice:"brown legendary vehicle pt")) then "white" else "black"}
font.shadowColor: {if is_shifted() or is_fnm() then rgb(0,0,0) else rgba(0,0,0,0)}

pt7.width: {if is_leveler() and not lone_pt() or card.pt_7 != "" then 60 else 0}

font.name: Beleren Bold
font.color: {if is_shifted() or is_fnm() then "white" else if is_vehicle() and (not is_legend() or chosen(styling.other_options, choice:"brown legendary vehicle pt")) then "white" else "black"}
font.shadowColor: {if is_shifted() or is_fnm() then rgb(0,0,0) else rgba(0,0,0,0)}

ptBox.left: { if is_leveler() and not lone_pt() then 278 else if is_map() then 270 else 273}
ptBox.top: { if is_leveler() and not lone_pt() then (l1_center() - (if is_map() then 26 else 18)) else if is_map() then 453 else 466}
ptBox.width: { if starting_loyalty() and not is_leveler() then 0 else if is_map() then 90 else 81}
ptBox.image: { if is_map() then mappt_background() else if is_vehicle() and (not is_legend() or chosen(styling.other_options, choice:"brown legendary vehicle pt")) then "vpt.png" else if is_clear() then "cpt.png" else choose_ptbox() }

ptBox2.width: { if (is_leveler() and not lone_pt()) or card.pt_2 != "" then (if is_map() then 90 else 81) else 0}
ptBox2.height: { if (is_leveler() and not lone_pt()) or card.pt_2 != "" then (if is_map() then 54 else 42) else 0}
ptBox2.image: {if is_map() then mappt_background() else combine_blend(image1: lv_2_ptbox(), image2: "ptbox_multiply_1.png", combine: "multiply")}

ptBox3.width: { if (is_leveler() and not lone_pt()) or card.pt_3 != "" then (if is_map() then 90 else 81) else 0}
ptBox3.height: { if (is_leveler() and not lone_pt()) or card.pt_3 != "" then (if is_map() then 54 else 42) else 0}
ptBox3.image: {if is_map() then mappt_background() else combine_blend(image1: lv_3_ptbox(), image2: "ptbox_multiply_2.png", combine: "multiply")}

ptBox4.width: { if (is_leveler() and not lone_pt()) or card.pt_3 != "" then (if is_map() then 90 else 81) else 0}
ptBox4.height: { if (is_leveler() and not lone_pt()) or card.pt_3 != "" then (if is_map() then 54 else 42) else 0}
ptBox4.image: {if is_map() then mappt_background() else combine_blend(image1: lv_4_ptbox(), image2: "ptbox_multiply_3.png", combine: "multiply")}

stamp.visible: { is_rare() and styling.use_holofoil_stamps and (is_devoid() or not is_clear()) }
stamp.image: { if is_map() then "maps/holo_stamp.png" else if is_devoid() then "devoid/stamp.png" else card_stamp() }

foilStamp.visible: { is_rare() and styling.use_holofoil_stamps and (is_devoid() or not is_clear()) }

foilLayer.mask: { "foil_mask" + (if card.pt != "" then "_pt") + (if is_rare() and styling.use_holofoil_stamps then "_rare") + ".png" }

nyxOverlay.mask: {"nyx/" + (if is_vehicle() then "v_" else "") + (if is_full_art() then "full" else "") + "mask.png"}

crown.image: {if (is_clear() or clear_tops()) and not is_devoid() then "legend/xcrown.png" else if is_fnm() then set_mask(image:crown_background(), mask:"legend/fnm_mask.png") else crown_background()}
crown.mask: {if is_legend() and styling.legend_crown != "custom" and (is_curtains() or is_expanded_art() or is_puma() or is_devoid()) then "curtainmask.png" else if is_season() then "crown_season_mask.png" else ""}

scrolls.image: {if is_puma() then "puma.png" else (if is_full_art() then "full_" else "") + "consscrolls.png"}

miracleOverlay.image: {if (is_clear() or clear_tops()) and not is_devoid() then "miracles/xmiracle.png" else miracle_background()}

snowOverlay.visible: {is_snow() and not pure_snow() and not is_expanded_art()}

clearFrame.image: { if is_devoid() then devoid_background() else if is_rare() and styling.use_holofoil_stamps then "clear_rare.png" else "clear.png"}

mirrorFrame.image: { if not clear_tops() then "" else if is_fnm() then fnm_background() else if is_inverted() then inverted_background() else if is_full_art() then promo_background() else card_background() }

mapFrame.image: { if is_map() then map_background() else energy_background() }

tarotWatermark.width: { if not is_tarot() then 0 else if is_map() then 287 else 334 }
tarotWatermark.height: { if is_map() then 154 else if is_full_art() then 120 else 152 }

lvlLabel0.left: {if box_leveler() then 8 else if loy_leveler() then 48 else 21}
lvlLabel0.width: {if is_leveler() or card.level_0 != "" then (if loy_leveler() then 10 else 34 + (if box_leveler() then 30 else 0)) else 0}
lvlLabel0.height: {if loy_leveler() then 10 else if center_label(0) then 0 else 10}

font.name: {if loy_leveler() then "MPlantin" else "Beleren Small Caps"}
font.size: {if loy_leveler() then 15 else if length(level_label(0)) < 8 or box_leveler() then 7 else 6}

lvlLabel1.left: {if box_leveler() then 8 else if loy_leveler() then 48 else 21}
lvlLabel1.width: {if is_leveler() or card.level_1 != "" then (if loy_leveler() then 10 else 34 + (if box_leveler() then 30 else 0)) else 0}
lvlLabel1.height: {if loy_leveler() then 10 else if center_label(1) then 0 else 10}

font.name: {if loy_leveler() then "MPlantin" else "Beleren Small Caps"}
font.size: {if loy_leveler() then 15 else if length(level_label(1)) < 8 or box_leveler() then 7 else 6}

lvlLabel2.left: {if box_leveler() then 8 else if loy_leveler() then 48 else 21}
lvlLabel2.width: {if is_leveler() or card.level_2 != "" then (if loy_leveler() then 10 else 34 + (if box_leveler() then 30 else 0)) else 0}
lvlLabel2.height: {if loy_leveler() then 10 else if center_label(2) then 0 else 10}

font.name: {if loy_leveler() then "MPlantin" else "Beleren Small Caps"}
font.size: {if loy_leveler() then 15 else if length(level_label(2)) < 8 or box_leveler() then 7 else 6}

lvlLabel3.left: {if box_leveler() then 8 else if loy_leveler() then 48 else 21}
lvlLabel3.width: {if is_leveler() or card.level_3 != "" then (if loy_leveler() then 10 else 34 + (if box_leveler() then 30 else 0)) else 0}
lvlLabel3.height: {if loy_leveler() then 10 else if center_label(3) then 0 else 10}

font.name: {if loy_leveler() then "MPlantin" else "Beleren Small Caps"}
font.size: {if loy_leveler() then 15 else if length(level_label(2)) < 8 or box_leveler() then 7 else 6}

level2Overlay.top: { if is_d20() then top_of_para(rolls_start(card.text)) else 329 + lv_2_coordinate()}
level2Overlay.height: { if is_d20() then height_of_para(rolls_start(card.text)) else lv_2_height()}
level2Overlay.visible: {(is_d20() and number_of_rolls(card.text) > 0) or (is_leveler() and not is_full_art() and not is_map() and not is_fnm() and not is_inverted())}

level3Overlay.top: { if is_d20() then top_of_para(rolls_start(card.text)+2) else 329 + lv_3_coordinate()}
level3Overlay.height: { if is_d20() then height_of_para(rolls_start(card.text)+2) else lv_3_height()}
level3Overlay.visible: {(is_d20() and number_of_rolls(card.text)-no_roll(card.text) > 2) or (is_leveler() and not is_full_art() and not is_map() and not is_fnm() and not is_inverted())}

level4Overlay.top: { if is_d20() then top_of_para(rolls_start(card.text)+4) else 329 + lv_4_coordinate()}
level4Overlay.height: { if is_d20() then height_of_para(rolls_start(card.text)+4) else lv_4_height()}
level4Overlay.visible: {(is_d20() and number_of_rolls(card.text)-no_roll(card.text) > 4) or (is_leveler() and not is_full_art() and not is_map() and not is_fnm() and not is_inverted())}

arrow1.image: {if loy_leveler() then loyalty_image(card.level_0) else if box_leveler() then choose_ptbox() else arrow_background()}

arrow2.image: {if loy_leveler() then loyalty_image(card.level_1) else if box_leveler() then choose_ptbox() else arrow_background()}

arrow3.image: {if loy_leveler() then loyalty_image(card.level_2) else if box_leveler() then choose_ptbox() else arrow_background()}

arrow4.image: {if loy_leveler() then loyalty_image(card.level_3) else if box_leveler() then choose_ptbox() else arrow_background()}

aliasBar.image: {if is_devoid() then (if is_legend() then alias_bar() else "alias/devoidalias.png") else if is_clear() or clear_tops() then "alias/xalias.png" else alias_bar()}

node.visible: {not is_map() and not is_clear() and use_node()}

choiceImages.custom: { if contains(styling.custom_symbol, match:".png") then "/magic-mainframe-extras.mse-include/" + styling.custom_symbol else "" }

pridePin.width: {if not is_pinned() then 0 else if is_legend() then 338 else 325}

vorthosBox.right: { if is_leveler() and not lone_pt() then 350 else if (starting_loyalty() and card.loyalty != "") then 300 else if (card.pt != "" and not starting_loyalty()) then 275 else 350 }
vorthosBox.width: { if is_leveler() and not lone_pt() then 140 else if (starting_loyalty() and card.loyalty != "") then 90 else if (card.pt != "" and not starting_loyalty()) then 65 else 140 }
